text: Tadera purbe nuhera sampradaya mithyaropa karechila, ara tadera pare an'ya aneka dala o pratyeka sampradaya nija nija payagambarake akramana karara iccha karechila ebam tara mithya bitarke prabrtta hayechila, yena satyadharmake byartha kare dite pare. Atahpara ami taderake pakara'o karalama. Kemana chila amara sasti.
